title: `en_ner_bionlp13cg_md` Label names are wrong?
body:
### How many and which are the correct labels of `en_ner_bionlp13cg_md`?

#### First possible list of labels
As far as I understand, the scispacy model `en_ner_bionlp13cg_md` should be trained on a corpus with 16 possible annotation labels (see e.g. [here](https://arxiv.org/pdf/1911.03869v3.pdf) for this list):
1. AMINO ACID
2. ANATOMICAL SYSTEM
3. CANCER
4. CELL
5. CELLULAR COMPONENT
6. CHEMICAL
7. DEVELOPING ANATOMICAL STRUCTURE
8. GENE/PROTEIN
9. IMMATERIAL ANATOMICAL
10. MULTI-TISSUE STRUCTURE
11. ORGAN
12. ORGANISM
13. ORGANISM SUBDIVISION
14. ORGANISM SUBSTANCE
15. PATHOLOGICAL FORMATION
16. TISSUE

Am I right in saying that `en_ner_bionlp13cg_md` predicts these 16 labels (just with different names)?

#### Second possible list of labels
However, if we run `spacy.load("en_ner_bionlp13cg_md").entity.labels` we get the following 17 labels
1. AMINO_ACID
2. ANATOMICAL_SYSTEM
3. CANCER
4. CELL
5. CELLULAR_COMPONENT
6. DEVELOPING_ANATOMICAL_STRUCTURE
7. ENTITY
8. GENE_OR_GENE_PRODUCT
9. IMMATERIAL_ANATOMICAL_ENTITY
10. MULTI
11. ORGAN
12. ORGANISM
13. ORGANISM_SUBDIVISION
14. ORGANISM_SUBSTANCE
15. PATHOLOGICAL_FORMATION
16. SIMPLE_CHEMICAL
17. TISSUE

This second list looks wrong to me. Indeed, after running the model on a few texts, I found out that the model actually never predicted `MULTI` or `TISSUE` labels (which however appear in the list), but did instead predict `MULTI-TISSUE_STRUCTURE` (which does not appear in the list!).

How is this possible? If `ner.entity.labels` is wrong, how can the predicted annotations be right?
Am I missing something?

#### Third possible list of labels
Finally, the list of entity types mentioned in the [scispacy docs|https://allenai.github.io/scispacy/] also look wrong to me. It mentions 14 labels:
1. AMINO_ACID
2. ANATOMICAL_SYSTEM
3. CANCER
4. CELL
5. CELLULAR_COMPONENT
6. DEVELOPING_ANATOMICAL_STRUCTURE
7. GENE_OR_GENE_PRODUCT
8. IMMATERIAL_ANATOMICAL_ENTITY
9. MULTI-TISSUE_STRUCTURE
10. ORGAN
11. ORGANISM
12. ORGANISM_SUBDIVISION
13. SIMPLE_CHEMICAL
14. TISSUE

For instance, `PATHOLOGICAL_FORMATION` is missing from this list.
